price: 225. Nabiyow matablaa! usun diggah yabti daqooruk ummaan daqaaral diraabah giirisaanam ilqaa kee faylat caddok taturak.
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي كُلِّ وَادٖ يَهِيمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: alam tara annahum fī kulli wādin yahīmūna
